Articles.Content:
![7V6Ysmk.png](http://i.imgur.com/7V6Ysmk.png)

**A-10 Warthog**

![bzFQQku.png](http://i.imgur.com/bzFQQku.png)

I've been asked to build an A-10, so here it is. I've actually built some versions, but none were as ridiculously stable and maneuverable as this one. You really have to try it out for yourself to see how good this thing is. Without SAS enabled, it will pitch down, but that is normal, but since it's thrust that is turning, flying upside down will make it pitch up. As these things go, this replica is pretty fast (you can see some mach effects in the second pic). It has the big machine gun it is known for in the front ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

[**DOWNLOAD**](http://www./download/97e4lhluqncackw/A-10+Warthog.craft)

![0DmV02p.png](http://i.imgur.com/0DmV02p.png)
![YGg1YRn.png](http://i.imgur.com/YGg1YRn.png)
Looks pretty cool, I wonder how it would do with the BD armory 30mm cannon. Have you tried it with a payload of any kind yet (stock or modded)?

> 
> Looks pretty cool, I wonder how it would do with the BD armory 30mm cannon. Have you tried it with a payload of any kind yet (stock or modded)?

I'm not entirely sure what payload means, but I guess weapons? Yes I have (stock, I don't really use mods), and it worked out fine. I used SAS, haven't tested without, so that might be an issue, but I doubt it. You'd probably just pull down a little quicker.
